name: Cutie Pets Jump Rope
description:
Welcome to Cutie Pets Jump Rope!

You are the one, the first platypus to rise in the morning and the last to go to sleep at night. You have one plat dream. To be jump rope champion! To be the last platypus standing!

Jump alone to try and get a high score or compete against up to four friends. (5 player) The last one standing will be the one wearing the crown! For every achievement you get, you also unlock a sweet stamp to post on Miiverse™. You can make posts with our cool stamps or share screenshots of your high score! Get jumping today!
